banner.title: About ESCO for Everyone
banner.description: ESCO for Everyone is a project developed by the Acuario research group to help teachers access the relevant skills, competences, qualifications, and occupations reflected in ESCO for the EU job market and education.

content.title: The Project
content.p1: The Acuario research group has been working over recent months on a tool to help teachers understand the relevant skills, competences, qualifications, and occupations reflected in ESCO for the EU job market and education.
content.p2: This knowledge can mainly be applied in the course guides of their subjects by simply providing a profile description. Our platform offers a graphical and interactive interface so that users can use this tool easily and intuitively.
content.p3: The system has been developed using agile methodologies, supports different user roles, and is available in both web and mobile versions with multilingual support.

goals.title: Project Objectives
goals.subtitle: Our platform aims to support teachers in designing their subjects aligned with the ESCO framework competencies.

items.title: Provide an innovative tool
items.description: Develop a platform that facilitates teachers' understanding of ESCO competencies and skills.

items.title: Foster collaboration
items.description: Enable different educational profiles to collaborate in building teaching guides aligned with ESCO.

items.title: Internationalization
items.description: Offer a multilingual platform that adapts to different European contexts.

items.title: Facilitate learning
items.description: Improve the teaching process by incorporating clear references to job competencies.

items.title: Use of open technologies
items.description: Develop the solution using free software and modern web technologies.

items.title: Continuous evaluation and improvement
items.description: Monitor the use of the tool to implement constant improvements based on feedback.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: A multidisciplinary team committed to developing innovative solutions for education.
